introPage.heroTitle: Peter Pan's Flutter Cross-Platform App Development
introPage.heroLead: Tailored for liberal arts students, learn programming from scratch and happily build Apps!
heroLines: Learn the latest technologies in Flutter cross-platform App development,
become a cool Flutter App development wizard,
and achieve your second life in App work, freelancing, and entrepreneurship!
learnItems: Independently develop Flutter cross-platform Apps, publish to App Store / Google Play.
Learn the latest Dart and Flutter SDK.
Design iOS / Android App interfaces using Flutter.
Develop over ten engaging Apps, applying common technologies such as RESTful API integration, data storage, animations, and state management.
Master development tools: VS Code, Android Studio, Firebase Studio.
